Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory667.jpg'}
{3: 'Over in the garden square, there is a pottery contest going on, lasting three days and two nights.'}
{3: 'Many signed up, but only a handful have shown up. Probably the whole pottery-making grind scares them off.'}
{3: 'While strolling through the open pottery workshop, you notice a familiar face.'}
{1: '1', 3: "Hanying's sitting on a stool, her hands working the clay with finesse."}
{3: "Humming away, she has her eyes locked on the task like she's one with the clay."}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Hey there, Commandant! You here to participate in the pottery contest too?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Just passing through.', 3: '12'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I see. Are you interested in this ancient craft from the Golden Age?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "It's kind of embarrassing, but I picked up pottery from this wandering human master.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Weirdly enough, shaping clay always gives me this incredible sense of calm...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Want to give it a shot together, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Reach out hands)', 3: '18'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "With Hanying's hands guiding yours, you feel the clay, still raw.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'No need to go too hard on it, just ease into it, Commandant. Feel anything?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'No, not really.', 3: '22'}
{2: 'Do you feel anything, Hanying?', 3: '23'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I feel like the clay is thawing from the early spring chill.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Well, it's just a metaphor. Don't make fun of me for that.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory667.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: "Time flies when you are shooting the breeze with Hanying, and suddenly, it's afternoon."}
{3: "Hanying's delicately carving into the clay, her blade weaving intricate designs."}
{3: "She looks at her creation, and a soft smile playing on her lips as if the vase isn't just pottery, but a piece of her soul laid bare."}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I wonder if this could win an award.', 4: '1'}
{2: "It's all about taking part, right?", 3: '34'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "You're absolutely right. It's the passion that keeps us grounded. The end result doesn't really matter.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Hanging out with you, Commandant, that's what makes my day.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "But there's this weird vibe today, different from the usual.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Master said it might mean my heart's being disturbed.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Not that I know what a heart involves exactly, but being with you feels different, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory668.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory668.jpg'}
{3: 'As the sun dips low, casting its final rays on the vase, Hanying sets out to work on the glaze.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'She picks out soft greens and classy whites, a reflection of herself, painting them onto the surface to complement the designs.'}
{3: 'Carefully, Hanying slides the vase into the kiln, her focus intense as the flames dance around it.'}
{3: "Once it's cooled, Hanying doesn't rush to put it on display..."}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "More than winning some award or ranking in a contest, I'd rather give something straight from my heart to you, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Today's Valentine's Day. It seems fitting, right, Commandant? Will you accept this?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thank you, Hanying.', 3: '54'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'No, I should be the one thanking you. With you, Commandant, by my side, loneliness is a thing of the past.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Master always said, pour your heart into the pottery.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Even though I can't compare to a real human, I still gave it my all.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Hope you'll think of me when you see the vase. That'd mean the world.", 4: '1'}
